1: -module(domaintable_SUITE).
    2: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    3: -include("../include/message.hrl").
    4: -include("../include/domaintable.hrl").
    5: -export([all/0]).
    6: -export([ insert_object_test/1,
    7:           object_by_Id_test/1,
    8:           object_by_position/1,
    9:           remove_object_test/1,
   10:           calcEuclidean_test/1]).
   11: 
   12: all() -> [insert_object_test,remove_object_test,calcEuclidean_test].
   13: 
   14: 
   15: insert_object_test(_Config)->
   16: 
   17:   application:set_env(mnesia, dir, ?DomaintableDB),
   18:   mnesia:start(),
   19:   Mars1 = #object{id = 0,position = {23,50,4},delta_pos =x},
   20:   {_,Result} =domaintable:insert_object(Mars1),
   21:   checkResult(Result),
   22:   ct:log("insert_object_test Passed").
   23: 
   24: object_by_Id_test(_Config)->
   25:  ok.
   26: object_by_position(_Config)->
   27:   ok.
   28: 
   29: remove_object_test(_Config)->
   30:   application:set_env(mnesia, dir, ?DomaintableDB),
   31: 
   32:   {_,Result}= domaintable:remove_object(0),
   33:   checkResult(Result),
   34:   ct:log("remove_object_test Passed")
   35:   .
   36: 
   37: calcEuclidean_test(_Config)->
   38:   Mars1 = #object{id = 0,position = {23,50,4},delta_pos =x},
   39:   Saturn1 = #object{id = 2, position = {100,-4, 70}, delta_pos =x},
   40:   Euclrounded = round(domaintable:calcEuclidean(Mars1, Saturn1)),
   41:   case Euclrounded of
   42:     115->
   43:       ok;
   44:     _Else->
   45:       ct:fail("Euclidean distance calculator is wrong")
   46:     end,
   47:   ct:log("Euclidean Distance is  ~w",[Euclrounded])
   48: 
   49:   .
   50: 
   51: 
   52: checkResult(Result)->
   53:   case Result of
   54:     ok->
   55:       ok;
   56:     _->
   57:       Reason = Result,
   58:       ct:fail(Reason)
   59:     end.
